main.name: Faith Ozoanieke
main.description: I eat, sleep and breathe React
main.bio: Hi there! I am Uju! You might also know me as UI/UX god. I've been coding for over a year now. As a Frontend developer I've worked both with startups and large corporations to help build & scale their companies. Along the journey I realised my passion existed in helping others excel and pursue their dreams as upcoming developers. With this passion, I have now trained thousand's of developers across the globe. Through live coaching sessions on Youtube, I have accumulated several MILLION views demonstrating how to apply developer skills in a range of cool builds and challenges. I deliver REAL VALUE by teaching REAL WORLD projects to help students enter the world of web development. Youâ€™ll get hands-on experience and learn the skills that are required to succeed in the real-world in this community.

testimonials.text: Uju is absolutely excellent, her depth of knowledge & her mentorship really meant a lot... I would definitely recommend
Learning with Uju has been AWESOME, she makes learning React so easy and approachable, you'll finally feel like you know what's going on!
